description: Scammer impersonates electricity board threatening immediate disconnection for unpaid bills. Demands urgent payment to avoid service cut.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT NOTICE from Maharashtra State Electricity Board (MSEB). Your connection no. 2468135790 has outstanding bill Rs.8,750. Pay within 2 HOURS or power will be disconnected today! -MSEB

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 1 | Persona: calm
api_response.agentResponse: oh no beta i am so sorry i thought i paid it already... pls dont cut the light i am old and i live alone i cant sit in dark. how to pay this? i have phonepe on my phone but i dont know how to use it properly... where do i send money? can you give me some number to call?

turns.scammer_message: Namaste, I am Suresh Patil, Assistant Engineer MSEB Div-7. Your 3 months electricity bill is pending Rs.8750. If not paid by 6 PM today, disconnection team will cut your connection. Are you at home?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 2 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Name(s), 2 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: namaste suresh sir pls dont cut the light i am at home only... i am very scared i have my phonepe open but where do i send? pls give me the upi id or bank details so i can pay right now... i dont want to be in dark tonight

turns.scammer_message: For immediate payment, you can use our online portal OR pay directly to MSEB official collection account. Transfer to PhonePe/GPay number: 9112233445 or UPI: mseb.billpay@paytm. Reconnection charge is extra Rs.500!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 UPI ID(s), 1 Phone(s), 1 Name(s), 3 Other Intel
api_response.agentResponse: suresh sir i typed the number 9112233445 in my phonepe but it is showing one name there... i want to be sure it is correct before i press pay... what name should show on my screen? i am very nervous pls help me beta i dont want to send to wrong person

turns.scammer_message: If online payment issue, do NEFT/IMPS to Account: 50200198765432, IFSC: HDFC0001789, Account Name: MSEB Bill Collection. Reference your connection number. Or call billing section: 7788990011

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 1 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: suresh sir i am trying to pay on the phonepe number you gave 9112233445 but it is showing name 'rajesh kumar'... is that your head office person? i dont want to send to wrong place and lose my pension money... and if i do the bank thing what is the phone number for that? i am so confused beta pls dont be angry

turns.scammer_message: Sir/Mam you can also visit emergency payment portal: http://mseb-online-billpay.in and pay there. Put your connection number 2468135790. Team is coming with disconnection order, please hurry!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: impersonation | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: calm | Extracted: 1 Bank Account(s), 1 UPI ID(s), 2 Phone(s), 1 URL(s), 1 IFSC Code(s), 3 Name(s)
api_response.agentResponse: suresh sir pls tell them to stop i am crying... i dont know how to use this website link it is not opening on my phone... if i do the bank transfer what name should i put for the account holder? my bank app says 'mseb bill collection' is not a person name... should i put rajesh kumar there also? pls tell them to wait 5 minutes i am trying
